items.todoItem: Know that there is liberty in Christ Jesus.
Beware of false brethren who seek to bring you into bondage.
Defend the truth of the gospel.
Know that God accepts no man’s person.
Know that a man is not justified by the works of the law but by faith in Jesus Christ.
Know that by the works of the law shall no man be justified.
Know that even the Jews must believe in Christ and have faith in order to be justified.
Know that you are dead to the law and alive unto God.
Know that the Son of God loves you and gave His life for you.
Know that you are crucified with Christ and no longer live but Christ lives in you.
Know that the life you now live in the flesh you live by the faith of the Son of God.
Do not frustrate the grace of God by seeking righteousness through obeying the law.
